name: Heritage Game Jam 2020 Lost In Time
name_original: Heritage Game Jam 2020 Lost In Time
description:
Heritage Game Jam 2020 Lost In Time
Sang Nila and Sir Stanford Raffles have been thrown into the future by the mythical Merlion, join them in their journey to explore this strange new world

z - shoot
x - change formation
c - charge beam
spacebar - shoot beam
esc - skip cutscenes

Mow Jun Hui - Programmer
Markus Ng Yong Ye - Programmer
cles - Programmer
DY - Artist/Designer
